monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Apex
skills.description: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Curse Breaker
skills.description: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Disarming Shielding
skills.description: For every shield applied there is a 10% chance to apply Armor Break, Weakness or Chill to a random enemy.

skills.name: Full Defense
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield, Regeneration & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Potential
skills.description: Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Gemstone Barrage
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gemstone Rain
skills.description: 6 x 25% (150%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 35% (210%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Icy Skin
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Chill on the attacker.

skills.name: Improved Barrier
skills.description: Unique Aura: Barrier (Buff) reduces damage received by an additional 7.5%.

skills.name: Jewel Blast
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Jewel Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Jewel Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (earth) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Generator
skills.description: Regenerate 4 Mana for every hit this Monster receives.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Observe
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, shield all Monsters in the party by 50% of this Monster's defense.

skills.name: Outlast
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gain their first, second, or third Age stack, they also gain a shield equal to 15% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Physical Resistance
skills.description: Physical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Poison Glands
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Poison on the attacker.

skills.name: Poisoning Soil
skills.description: Every Earth attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Preemptive Shield
skills.description: Aura: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 75% of this Monster's Defense value to the whole party.

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Ram Charge
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Reflect
skills.description: When getting attacked, reflect 40% (20% in Keeper Battles) of the damage back to the attacker. (Reflected damage isn't affected by any modifiers)

skills.name: Restoring Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (50 + 15% Defense) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (60 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (75 + 15% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (100 + 15% Defense) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restoring Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield target for 7 x (125 + 15% Defense) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Snow Veil
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Spiky Defense
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Armor Break on the attacker.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Toxic Slam
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Volatile Shield
skills.description: Every attack consumes 50% of the current shield to do an additional hit equal to 175% of that value.

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
